pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, October 21, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Metro Vancouver, British Columbia

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Public Safety Marco E. L. Mendicino will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
